recommendations: Grant Meyer
Scrum Master at Entertainment Partners
August 15, 2010, Grant worked with Geoffrey in different groups

I have worked with Geoff on several different projects and can highly recommend him.  He is an excellent QA Engineer and an excellent leader and organizer.  He consistently shows initiative, creativity and dedication and he is terrific at helping organize team efforts as well.  I have worked with him on traditional waterfall projects and on agile/SCRUM projects and he has been invaluable on both types.  His technical expertise, humor, and ability to work well with others make him a real asset to any team.

Vishal Tiwari, MSMIT
Director Quality Engineering at S&P Global Market Intelligence
July 21, 2010, Geoffrey worked with Vishal in the same group

Geoff was given the lead role for the Integration Contract project, a project that he had never worked upon. He took upon the challenge and quickly became the SME for that project. The project faced numerous challenges, i.e. constant change in requirement from our global clients, using the new agile software development process being implemented, and continuous change in resources. He led his team of 3, who also had little to no knowledge, and was instrumental in releasing the product in time.In addition to this, he has led a team of 4-5 test engineers for the Sustained Engineering division within the QA department, and ensured that multiple patches of ACT!'s windows/web client be tested thoroughly in different platforms.

summary: Software Quality Assurance Professional with over 17 years experience helping businesses reduce risks and improve the quality of mission-critical Mobile, Web, and Desktop applications. Accomplished in leading QA teams utilizing industry proven methods, techniques, and smart automation in both Agile Software Development (Scrum) and Waterfall Software Development Model. Hands-on experience in automation, functional, usability, performance, security, compatibility, localization, and user acceptance testing. ISTQB Certified Tester.
name: Geoffrey Viado
title: Software Test Automation Consultant/ISTQB Certified
